products.name: Lavender Handmade Soap
products.description: A soothing handmade soap with the calming scent of lavender. Made with natural ingredients and essential oils.

products.name: Tea Tree & Eucalyptus Soap
products.description: An invigorating soap blend of tea tree and eucalyptus oils, perfect for a refreshing shower experience.

products.name: Oatmeal & Honey Soap
products.description: A gentle exfoliating soap made with oatmeal and honey, leaving your skin feeling soft and moisturized.

products.name: Coconut Milk Soap
products.description: Nourish your skin with the creamy lather of coconut milk soap. Perfect for hydrating dry skin.

products.name: Lemongrass & Sage Soap
products.description: Refresh and rejuvenate your senses with the energizing scent of lemongrass and sage in this all-natural soap.

products.name: Charcoal Detox Soap
products.description: Cleanse and detoxify your skin with this activated charcoal soap. Helps to draw out impurities and toxins.

products.name: Rosemary Mint Soap
products.description: Invigorate your senses with the refreshing blend of rosemary and mint in this natural handmade soap.

products.name: Shea Butter Soap
products.description: Pamper your skin with the luxurious moisture of shea butter soap. Great for dry and sensitive skin types.

products.name: Orange Zest Soap
products.description: Brighten your day with the uplifting citrus scent of orange zest soap. Leaves your skin feeling refreshed and revitalized.

products.name: Cucumber Aloe Vera Soap
products.description: Soothe and hydrate your skin with the cooling properties of cucumber and aloe vera in this gentle soap.
